title: Production of Canola in Canada 2019
summary: The graph shows the Production of Canola Canada ( in Tonnes ) in Canada the year 2019 .
Production is very different over the year .
While a significant decline in Production can be observed from January to February , Production continues to rise until April , reaching its annual maximum of more than 42000 Tonnes .
gold: This is a line chart about the production of canolas in Canada for the year 2019 . Starting from Jan with 1.8 tones production , it remained lower than 1.8 tones until September , when the production increases hugely to around 2.75 tones . It then quickly drops to 1.5 tones in November and slightly increases to around 2 tones in Dec .
